footer.quote: The Office quote of the day

homePage.subtitle: My Expertise
homePage.softDevText: Experiences in both functional and OOP: Python, JavaScript, TypeScript
homePage.frontDevText: Passionate about UI/UX. Over 2 years of development experience in HTML, CSS, JS, React and NextJS frameworks.
homePage.androidDevText: Skilled in developing hybrid mobile apps and cross–platform solutions using the React Native framework.
homePage.aboutMeText: Curious about my professional journey or establish a connection? Explore my comprehensive CV for a detailed overview of my experience and achievements. Feel free to reach out and drop me a message if you'd like to discuss potential collaborations or simply connect!
homePage.myProjectsText: Want to see what I have made? Take a look at some of the projects I’ve worked on. I have made counless personal projects and made huge impacts for the companies I’ve helped update there applications.

aboutPage.frontendDeveloperText: A creative and experienced Frontend developer with an Advanced Higher Vocational Education Diploma from Medieinstitutet - Stockholm. I have wide knowledge within applications, websites and extensions. Currently, I am seeking opportunities within a developing field.
aboutPage.getInTouchText: Wanna get in touch? Ask me anything.
aboutPage.name: Name
aboutPage.subject: Subject

galleryPage.openProject: Click on a project to open its link
galleryPage.mobileAppText: With this app you can get cash back when you shop online from over 600 stores. The money is shared between you and an association of your choice.
galleryPage.browserExtensionText: A browser tool that simplifies shopping with Sponsorhuset online.
galleryPage.catBoxText: An interactive game where the player learns flexbox attributes.
galleryPage.tictactoeText: A simple TicTacToe game for two players where the goal is to get three in a row.
galleryPage.webshopText: A group work that was done during my education at the media institute. A wallpaper webshop.
